movie_1.title: The Llama Whisperer
movie_1.plot: In a small town, a mysterious stranger arrives with an uncanny ability to communicate with llamas. Chaos ensues as the town's eccentric residents compete to learn the secrets of llama whispering.

movie_2.title: Attack of the Killer Squirrels
movie_2.plot: When a nuclear accident grants squirrels superintelligence and razor-sharp teeth, a group of friends must fight for their lives against the relentless army of acorn-obsessed rodents.

movie_3.title: The Dancing Tacos
movie_3.plot: In a world where tacos come to life, a shy chef discovers a hidden talent for salsa dancing. Joined by a lively group of singing and dancing tacos, they set out to win the ultimate dance competition and save their beloved taco truck from closure.
